item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 28, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I built a hardware processor that runs Python (489 points | 142 comments)
2. Reports of widespread power cuts in Spain and Portugal (653 points | 598 comments)
3. Show HN: Web-eval-agent – Let the coding agent debug itself (25 points | 7 comments)
4. Show HN: A pure WebGL image editor with filters, crop and perspective correction (25 points | 6 comments)
5. Uncovering the mechanics of The Games: Winter Challenge (195 points | 87 comments)
6. Activeloop (YC S18) Is Hiring VP of Engineering in Mountain View (On-Site) ( | hide)
7. Show HN: Autarkie – Instant grammar fuzzing using Rust macros (18 points | 2 comments)
8. Show HN: Sim Studio – Open-Source Agent Workflow GUI (24 points | 1 comment)
9. Vision Transformers Need Registers (5 points | 1 comment)
10. Tiny-LLM – a course of serving LLM on Apple Silicon for systems engineers (110 points | 10 comments)
11. DeepSeek-R2 (4 points | discuss)
12. Reanimation of the original Logic Theorist, the first AI, in IPL-V (12 points | 2 comments)
13. Reality Check (16 points | 3 comments)
14. Internet in a Box (795 points | 202 comments)
15. Why Pale Blue Dot generates feelings of cosmic insignificance (20 points | 31 comments)
16. Show HN: I made a web-based, free alternative to Screen Studio (385 points | 88 comments)
17. The Books of Earthsea by Ursula K. Le Guin (12 points | 4 comments)
18. AI helps unravel a cause of Alzheimer’s and identify a therapeutic candidate (287 points | 137 comments)
19. How a single line of code could brick your iPhone (437 points | 102 comments)
20. Ask HN: What are you working on? (April 2025) (223 points | 654 comments)
21. The group chats that changed America (98 points | 52 comments)
22. Presentation Slides with Markdown (176 points | 59 comments)
23. Inference-Aware Fine-Tuning for Best-of-N Sampling in Large Language Models (61 points | 8 comments)
24. Read the Obits (260 points | 108 comments)
25. New material gives copper superalloy-like strength (147 points | 86 comments)
26. Did 5G kill the IMSI catcher? (243 points | 105 comments)
27. The hospital where staff treat fear of death as well as physical pain (85 points | 79 comments)
28. I just want to code (2023) (255 points | 151 comments)
29. Reversing the Fossilization of Computer Science Conferences (62 points | 44 comments)
30. Reverse geocoding is hard (256 points | 122 comments)
